trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_SEQ_00<tab>Zukin has an eye for eggs.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_00<tab>Lure out tatsunoko with live ruby shrimp near Sakazuki and slay them for their roe.
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the tatsunoko roe to the cook at the Ruby Price.
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the fine Hingan wine to Zukin.

TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the very <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> I was seeking. There is a task I would have you perform in the name of trade relations.
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>Take these live ruby shrimp and release them along the shore of Sakazuki. This will lure out tatsunoko, whose roe you may then harvest.

TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_002<tab>Once you have the roe, pray deliver it to the cook at the Ruby Price. He will know what to do with it. My thanks in advance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_020<tab>Looking for the cook? You've found him. What is it you require?
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_021<tab>Oho, if this isn't tatsunoko roe, and some of the freshest I've seen! Compliments of Zukin, you say? Well, how thoughtful of him!

TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_022<tab>In case you didn't know, tatsunoko roe is a rare delicacy. I'll be able to prepare such a treat for our troops as they seldom enjoy! Now, such kindness shouldn't go unacknowledged...
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_023<tab>One of the finest wines I have in my stores. Please give it to Zukin along with my regards. And with that, I take my leave─I have a feast to prepare!
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_030<tab>...Our gift was so well received that we received one in return? Wonderful!

TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_031<tab><sniff> Ah, this is truly a fine rice wine. We've not the means to brew our own, so it is doubly appreciated. My thanks for handling the task, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_032<tab>Ever since we began trading with Kokajiya, travel to Kugane has become a regularity. This in turn led to more opportunities for contact with the Ruby Price.

TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_033<tab>For now, the fortification serves simply as a convenient waypoint, but ere long it will become a destination in its own right. Our efforts to establish new trade channels continue to flourish, and we owe no small part of our success to you.
